messages.text:
Agriculture HQ — We're trying to send groups of volunteers every day from Beit Kama to farms in the Gaza envelope and the region. The farmers are desperate, there are no workers at all, and we all want to save something!
It can be for one or two days here and there, or sleeping at the farm for several consecutive days, depending on the task and the farm.
Departure from Beit Kama (with escort) at 07:30.
Fieldwork: 08:30–15:00.
About one workday.

—Lisa.
0528652788
Tel: 0528652788
Please send WhatsApp privately.

Thanks 🌶️
+972 58-580-2002 joined using this group's invite link
